holidays.name: American Teddy Bear Day
holidays.description: A day dedicated to celebrating the iconic teddy bear, a beloved stuffed animal named after President Theodore Roosevelt.
holidays.origin: Inspired by a 1902 hunting trip where Roosevelt refused to shoot a captured bear, leading to a toy maker creating the teddy bear in his honor.
holidays.funFact: The teddy bear inspired the creation of one of the first mass-produced stuffed animals, making it a classic childhood companion worldwide.

holidays.name: Equality Day
holidays.description: A day promoting awareness and advocacy for social equality and justice across all communities.
holidays.origin: Observed by various groups to highlight ongoing struggles for civil rights and fair treatment worldwide.
holidays.funFact: Equality Day reminds us that achieving equal rights remains a vital cause in every society across the globe.
